description:
Hello^^
I've been living in South Korea for last 6 years
I've received my bachelor here and been working in a cosmetics company since (marketing,sales)
For hobbies, honestly I'm being lazy to do anything mostly, like to watch movies and dramas on Netflix and others (for now my fav one is la casa de papel, yeah, mainstream, I know^^), figure skating, also attending amateur choir, we sing Mozart's Requiem (I'm alto haha..)
Harry Potter fan
Infp-t
Also I have a chubby cat
Vaccinated Phizer 2 shots, gonna get 3rd as well ...
Nice to meet you
